ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Message boards?
ygData.msgSnippet: i think what they are tryin to get across is that enchanters can do more than just mez, i m a crazy a$$ chanter often goin deep into Kael with just a few
ygData.messageBody:
i think what they are tryin to get across is that enchanters can do more
than just mez, i'm a crazy a$$ chanter often goin deep into Kael with just a
few people and a charm spell. course when you get up to higher levels charm
doesn't resist :o) (7th ilse in air /drool)

also personally i think Rune is prolly the best spell to put on a robe as
long as the recast isn't over 20second (i don't remeber recast time heh)
but there are so many times where i'm left manaless after 5 runes, and it's
such a nice spell to have on your people on big raids. i can't think of a
better spell to put on it cept maybe rune5.

Anyway i know nothing is gonna please everyone... but when you used to
being the only chanter to buff 30-40 people, the only thing you want is
Shissar to last about 10 mins longer (cause recasting that on 30+ peeps
gets annoying fast).






>
>I think they have a right to be though, don't you? I was reading all the
>responses to Absor's post on Enchanters and some of the other classes and I
>think I am the only one who doesn't really care that some (ok, near all)
>the
>SoV mobs have such high MR and many , many are unmezzable. So what its a
>few zones, there are so many other places to go you cant complain about a
>handful of zones that we cant mez in. Granted I am only 54 but it doesn't
>really bother me. I also got a kick out of how many people were bitching
>about wanting new Illusions. Yeah, I think some of the reasons they give
>for not giving us new Illusions are pretty much crap and wish they would
>just be honest. But I could really give a poo if we don't get anymore.
>Not
>unless they don't have some sort of use to them (faction, stat +'s that are
>worth the time/manna it takes to cast).
>
>Mu
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Stallion02@... [mailto:Stallion02@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, January 30, 2001 5:46 PM
>To: eqenchanters@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Message boards?
>
>
>if you want a noisy class talk to the rangers.
>
>
>
